entity.name: Trades Guilds
entity.entry:
The trades include smiths, masons, clothiers, painters, shoemakers, tanners, grocers, drapers, spicers, fishmongers, moneychangers, apothecaries, barbers, scribes and others still. The [family:6801053|Drip Monks] are plumbers and have their own guild.

As the players maneuver through adventures within the city they might do a favor for this or that merchant gaining a level of [ability:6801106|renown] with the following benefits:

  • Honorary Apprentice - No guildsman will never cheat you
  • Honorary Journeyman - 5% discounts
  • Honorary Master - 10% discounts
  • Elder - Not attainable
  • Grand Master - Not attainable

Jokingly, they Trades will refer to the player with a title by dropping the term “Honorary” and just calling them “Apprentice Playername.” It would be extremely rare to earn the title of Master and impossible to earn the titles of Elder or Grand Master.
